entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy late in the afternoon. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow or rain. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the evening then changing to rain before morning. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h near midnight then southwest 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 28 January 2023
